scripts.generateGitHubUrl: sh scripts/saveGitHubCommitHashUrl.sh && git add commitHash.ts && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.release-dev: yarn generateGitHubUrl && yarn fetch-tags && git tag -m 'Current DEV environment'   -a -f DEV  $(git rev-parse HEAD) && yarn push-tags
scripts.release-test: yarn generateGitHubUrl && yarn fetch-tags && git tag -m 'Current TEST environment' -a -f TEST $(git rev-parse HEAD) && yarn push-tags
scripts.release-qa: yarn generateGitHubUrl && yarn fetch-tags && git tag -m 'Current QA environment'     -a -f QA   $(git rev-parse HEAD) && yarn push-tags
scripts.release-prod: yarn generateGitHubUrl && yarn fetch-tags && git tag -m 'Current PROD environment' -a -f PROD $(git rev-parse HEAD) && yarn push-tags
scripts.push-tags: git push origin --tags -f && echo Check status: https://console.radix.equinor.com/applications/vsm/jobs
scripts.use-dev: yarn generateGitHubUrl && cp environment-variables/DEV.env .env && yarn dev
scripts.use-test: yarn generateGitHubUrl && cp environment-variables/TEST.env .env && yarn dev
scripts.use-qa: yarn generateGitHubUrl && cp environment-variables/QA.env .env && yarn dev
scripts.use-prod: yarn generateGitHubUrl && cp environment-variables/PROD.env .env && yarn dev
scripts.run-dev: yarn generateGitHubUrl && docker build -t equinor-flyt . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --env-file ./environment-variables/DEV.env equinor-flyt
scripts.run-test: yarn generateGitHubUrl && docker build -t equinor-flyt . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --env-file ./environment-variables/TEST.env equinor-flyt
scripts.run-qa: yarn generateGitHubUrl && docker build -t equinor-flyt . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --env-file ./environment-variables/QA.env equinor-flyt
scripts.run-prod: yarn generateGitHubUrl && docker build -t equinor-flyt . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --env-file ./environment-variables/PROD.env equinor-flyt
